abstract: Lender Processing Services, a provider of technology support to mortgage lenders, is in advanced talks to sell itself to its former parent, Fidelity National Financial, and the buyout firm THL Partners for about $2.9 billion, a person briefed on the matter said Wednesday.
snippet: Lender Processing Services, a provider of technology support to mortgage lenders, is in advanced talks to sell itself to its former parent, Fidelity National Financial, and the buyout firm THL Partners for about $2.9 billion, a person briefed on t...
lead_paragraph: Lender Processing Services, a provider of technology support to mortgage lenders, is in advanced talks to sell itself to its former parent, Fidelity National Financial, and the buyout firm THL Partners for about $2.9 billion, a person briefed on the matter said Wednesday.

headline.main: Fidelity National and THL Partners Said to Be in Talks for Loan Processing Firm

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
